issue.title: HadoopFileSystem.isdir and .isfile should return False if the path doesn't exist
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2085](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2085). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Per the python standard library, `isdir` and `isfile` should return `False` if the given path doesn't exist. Currently these methods error on missing paths.
